# This file should only contain RELATIVE paths to ~. There should not be any ~ characters directly
# This is only for OVERRIDES. By default everything in .config is synced
# convention is local <colon> remote, where actual file paths are ~/$local, <repo>/wsl/config/<remote>

# These are safe to directly copy. 
.bashrc:.bashrc
.profile:.profile
.ideavimrc:.ideavimrc
.claude/commands:.claude/commands
/etc/keyd/surface.conf:etc/keyd/surface.conf
/etc/systemd/system.conf.d/omarchy.conf:etc/systemd/system.conf.d/omarchy.conf
/etc/systemd/sleep.conf.d/omarchy.conf:etc/systemd/sleep.conf.d/omarchy.conf
/etc/default/limine:etc/default/limine
/etc/systemd/logind.conf.d/lid.conf:etc/systemd/logind.conf.d/lid.conf
/etc/modprobe.d/nvidia-power.conf:etc/modprobe.d/nvidia-power.conf
/etc/mkinitcpio.conf:etc/mkinitcpio.conf


# These are privatized (in gitignore)
# If not autogenerated, there are X.example files public in the repo to copy over
# .ssh:.ssh
# .gnupg:.gnupg
